Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Three years have passed.'}
{3: 'Once unsure about her future, Ayla has long since found her direction in life.'}
{3: 'As long as she continues on this path, she will become the person she dreamed to become one day.'}
{3: 'She firmly believes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Alright. I just need a little bit more olive green... And add some contrast...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Phew! That should do it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Knockingâ€”'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Ma'am? One sec, I'm packing up!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: '...That lady is waiting for you downstairs. You got plans today?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yeah, I need to talk to them about the new exhibition proposal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...I wish I could just stay at home painting all the time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "As long as I keep making great works, there won't be any problem.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'They should just give me a calm and peaceful environment, so I can focus on my art!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Gosh. I'm just not good at this proposal thing.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: "Well, sometimes going out isn't too bad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "You get to relax a little, and you may get inspiration from visiting different places and seeing different people and things, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "There won't be any inspiration. I have been to every place in Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "If I see the same view over and over again, I may even get bored and start to hate what I'm doing.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: 'Well... Ayla, you have grown a lot.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Well, I'll see you later then!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'Ayla! You made me wait for 15 minutes again!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Huh? Does it matter? I was fine-tuning some details.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'I know your works are great, but the proposal is equally important!'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "If we don't have a good spot, no matter how great your works are, they won't catch a lot of attention."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's not possible. Even if my works are displayed in a corner, they won't be ignored.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: '...You really give me headaches. Confidence is great, but...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Selena is coming today, right? I haven't seen her for a while. We were debating about ancient sculptures.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'Oh, about that...'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "I can only tell you that she's not coming today. You may want to read her mail first."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Mail? I didn't get any.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "No, for some reason, she couldn't send it to your terminal."}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'So she wrote a paper letter and asked me to pass it to you. Tsk, what an old-fashioned way.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Couldn't send it? What happened...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "Hmm, it actually may be a good thing, but I'm too ordinary to understand it... Just read it first."}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "It's been a while since we last met, Ayla. Four months?"}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'It was your birthday and we celebrated your coming of age together. Too bad we spent all the time discussing great sculpture works.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'So we never had the chance to properly sit down and talk.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'Remember what I said about becoming a Construct?'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'You asked me why. Why not continue with a career in art?'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'If we keep doing what we are doing, our reputation, status, and living conditions will only get better.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: '...My answer is, art should not exist only in a world of our own.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'I thought a lot. Born and raised in Babylonia, we took the peaceful, comfortable and abundant life for granted.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "But that's only the world as we know it. Is that truly what it is?"}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'I once read that all artworks were an imitation of natural objects.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'What if our creations were based only on an unrealistic, partial impression of the real world?'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'It made me wonder. I wanted to discover what the real world is like.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'Maybe our path would be rectified if we could portray the world as it truly is.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'But I ended up shocked by the knowledge I found.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'It turned out that outside the peaceful and harmonious world we lived in, there was another cruel world full of conflict and war.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "Because of those people's hard work, or even sacrifice, we got to enjoy our peaceful lives."}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "I was traumatized, but I didn't want to tell you. We were raised with so much on our shoulders."}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'We must help humanity to survive, and pass on the knowledge and wisdom.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "That's why I asked the WGAA to make me a Construct. And I succeeded."}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: "Ah, I'm just writing down whatever comes to my mind. I'm afraid we won't be able to see each other again, but I'll try to keep in touch."}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: '...Lastly, Ayla. I believe that neither of us has chosen the wrong way.'}
{2: "Selena's Letter 064", 3: 'We will still fight together, for the same ultimate goal. Just in different worlds.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "How could she...! She didn't even tell me before becoming a Construct...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I can't take this! That's not what friends do to each other!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'Ayla, Selena left you a software that makes virtual theater plays. Seems like she came up with the original scripts.'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'We are exhibiting a slightly modified version.'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: 'If she left you the original, she must want you to understand how she felt in the beginning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "But I already know everything. What's the point of giving this to me now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "Um, instead of feeling upset, why not be happy for your friend? She's found her way!"}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "Plus, Selena's position is quite special... Maybe you will get to work together again in the future!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Is that so...? You're right...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena said it too... She hoped we could both excel in our own field.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Anyway, thanks for passing this on to me. It means a lot. I'll cheer up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exhibition Manager', 3: "You are most welcome. Well, don't forget you still have a business meeting to attend! Make sure you get the best location in the exhibition!"}
